name: Single filer at low income
description: Low earner at €25,000 in Spain - below median income

sources.description: Calculated using 2025 Spanish national IRPF rates and Social Security contributions
sources.notes: National tax: 19% up to €12,450, 24% up to €20,200, 30% above. Personal allowance €5,550. SS: 6.48% on full amount.
